name: The DOG Adventure Collection
description:
Finally, the whole series of the classic DOG Adventure games together, in one collection! Experience the classic story in not only the epic journey of Katy's DOG Adventure, but the sequel, Jenny's DOG Adventure too!

Contains three point-and-click adventures totalling up to dozens of minutes of fun!

Katy's DOG Adventure

Help Katy reach her life-saving medicine, BEFORE time runs out!

Jenny's DOG Adventure

When a life-threatening storm threatens millions of lives, only one meteorologist has any chance to stop it!

DOG Adventure 2

"DOG Adventure 2" is the finale to the trilogy (of four games) - and both characters will need each others' interference if they want to solve all their problems! Contains an exclusive DLC chapter starring a fan favourite character.

So what are you waiting for? Pre-order today!

But that's not all! 

Also included are the bonus features from the second game... and two new tie-in games set before the events of DOG Adventure 2!

KatyXMotorbikeVampireShotgun

In this short experience, you play as Katy! Approaching the vampire's weather control tower in a polite homage to 1980s arcade racing games, this game is a tie-in set before the events of DOG Adventure 2.

Once you've had enough of that nonsense, play a real game in 

Manual Analysis Pod Refueling Arbitrary Process Simulator

Fuel the pods in a mania of pipe management! (Includes custom level creator). This game is a tie-in set before the events of DOG Adventure 2.

So? Are you ready?? For a DOG Adventure???

(warning, DOG is an acronym and games may or not contain any dogs)
